Ancestral Spirit's Horn.Location: Obtained when unlocking the Remembrance of the Regal Ancestor's power by handing it over to Enia at Roundtable Hold.

Boltdrake Talisman +2.Location: +2 Variation: The closest grace is Dragon Temple Rooftop (Farum Azula). Jump off Dragon Rooftop and progress down until you get to a large area where is or used to be a big Dragon. There turn East and go to the cliff edge. You can drop down to get to a building. Go up the ladder. There's a chest here with a Dragon Towershield on the left from the ladder. Take the lift up and go right to find a Crucible Knight fighting beastmen. Past him is a ladder. Climb it and you've found the Boltdrake Talisman +2.

Companion Jar.Location: After complete Jar Bairn's side quest at Jarburg, recieve from Jar Bairn's previous location.

Crimson Amber Medallion +2.Location: +2 Variation: Can be found in Leyndell, Capital of Ash. Just south of the site of grace drop down the open sewer grate to the beam below.

Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2.Location: +2 Variation: can be found on a floating platform in Crumbling Farum Azula between Dragon Temple Lift and Dragon Temple Rooftop.

Erdtree's Favor +2.Location: +2 Variant can be found in Leyndell, Ashen Capital and may only be accessed near endgame/post-game. Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by two large rotten beasts. [Interactive Map Link]

Magic Scorpion Charm.Location:
Obtained from talking to Preceptor Seluvis after obtaining the Fingerslayer Blade but before giving it to Ranni the Witch.
 Obtained by giving Preceptor Seluvis the Amber Starlight after Seluvis tells you about his scheme.

Millicent's Prosthesis.Location: When you are given the choice at the end of Millicent's questline between aiding or challenging her, choose to challenge her. When you kill her, you will automatically receive this talisman. Map Link  Alternatively, to obtain both this and the Rotten Winged Sword Insignia (given when you assist her), kill Millicent after assisting her. Doing so will prevent you from obtaining Miquella's Needle.

Old Lord's Talisman.Location:
Found in a chest in Crumbling Farum Azula. Map Link.
 When you get on the large crumbling bridge, instead of going up to the boss, go the opposite way down to a building. Navigate through it and take the ladder down to a bridge connecting to the tower housing the chest.

Rotten Winged Sword Insignia.Location: Earned after choosing to assist Millicent and successfully defeat her sisters.

Shard of Alexander.Location: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander after completing his questline.

Warrior Jar Shard.Location: Drops from Iron Fist Alexander after completing his questline.

Arrow's Reach Talisman.Location: Inside the tower above Stormgate. It can be accesed by going up and turn left, all around until you get back to Stormgate but through the upper ground. Map Coordinates Link.

Arrow's Sting Talisman.Location: Located in a chest on the top of the tower directly above Impassable Greatbridge (Grace), which is infront of the Redmane Castle in Caelid. Map Link.

Arsenal Charm.Location: Looted off a body inside the room where the Many Armed Key Master is in the wine cellar of the Stormveil Castle in Stormhill.

Arsenal Charm +1.Location: +1 Variant: Within Altus Tunnel located in the Altus Plateau, upon reaching a massive chamber you will want to drop down onto a platform below and then climb up the tree root to a higher platform where the charm will be waiting on a body.

Assassin's Cerulean Dagger.Location: Dropped by the Black Knife Assassin boss found in Black Knife Catacombs in the northeast of the Liurnia of the Lakes region.

Assassin's Crimson Dagger.Location: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin, found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. Map Link.

Axe Talisman.Location: Found in a cellar underneath the Mistwood Ruins. Map Link.

Blessed Dew Talisman.Location: Leyndell: Found west of the Divine Bridge Site of Grace, guarded by a Golem. Map Link.

Blue Dancer Charm.Location: Dropped by the Guardian Golem boss in the Highroad Cave. Map Link.

Blue-Feathered Branchsword.Location: Drops from a Deathbird east of the Warmaster's Shack near collapsed structure with Rune Fragments and Sanctuary stones on it.

Boltdrake Talisman.Location: Located at Stormveil Castle. Map Link.

Boltdrake Talisman +1.Location: +1 Variation: Can be found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

Bull-Goat's Talisman.Location: In the back of Dragonbarrow Cave. From the entrance, take a left into the Giant Bear's patrol route. Search that side of the cave and it will be at the end of it on a corpse.

Carian Filigreed Crest.Location: Can be purchased from War Counselor Iji as part of Blaidd's questline. Map Link.

Cerulean Amber Medallion.Location: Lakeside Crystal Cave after defeating the Bloodhound Knight.

Cerulean Amber Medallion +1.Location: +1 Variation: Castle Sol: Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform very long combos.

Cerulean Amber Medallion +2.Location: +2 Variation: Lunar Estate Ruins: Found in a treasure chest in an underground room northwest of the ruins. Look for an Imp Statue pressed up against the wall. This requires 1 Stonesword Key. The stairs are also concealed by an illusory floor. Simply hit the floor next to the Imp Statue to reveal the stairs.

Cerulean Seed Talisman.Location: Can be found in Carian Study Hall.

Clarifying Horn Charm.Location: Found on a corpse lying on the stairs leading to the lift going up to the Deep Siofra Well. Map Link.

Clarifying Horn Charm +1.Location: +1 Variation: Can be found on a corpse in the middle and at the lowest floor of a ruin in Nokron, Eternal City. Map Link.

Claw Talisman.Location: Located at Stormveil Castle, looted off a corpse situated on a watchtower. Map Link.

Concealing Veil.Location: Dropped by the boss in Sage's Cave.

Crepus's Vial.Location: Obtained by the enemy you kill during the second assassination task in the Volcano Manor questline, Rileigh the Idle. Map Link.

Crimson Amber Medallion.Location: Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping Peninsula, for  1500 Runes. Map Link.

Crimson Amber Medallion +1.Location: +1 Variation: Can be found in Volcano Manor. Go to the prison church site of grace, go out and through the little town as if you were progressing through the manor as normal, and use a Stonesword Key to go through the fog gate. A big moving saw enemy is there but you can easily run up the stairs to the level above, where the talisman is on a dead body. Map Link.

Crimson Seed Talisman.Location: Found in locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave (Altus Plateau). This area is accessed after defeating Black Knife Assassin outside.

Crucible Knot Talisman.Location: Dropped by Omenkiller, located in the Village of the Albinaurics. Map Link.

Crucible Scale Talisman.Location: Can be found in Leyndell Catacombs.

Curved Sword Talisman.Location: Looted from a treasure chest inside the room where you fight the Banished Knight, located at the wine cellar of Stormveil Castle. You must use the secret back entrance that Gatekeeper Gostoc suggests to reach the said room. Map Link.

Daedicar's Woe.Location: You get this at the end of Rya's questline if you do not give her the Tonic of Forgetfulness. (edit : Rya will still drop the talisman even if the potion was given to her. After completing the manor questlines, you will find her in the drawing room. Exhaust her dialogues, rest, and go back to her location. She will be gone, and the talisman will be dropped on the floor.)

Dagger Talisman.Location: On a corpse. The closest Site of Grace is the Temple of Eiglay. Two Stonesword Keys are required to reach the item.

Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman.Location: At a building north to the Drainage Channel Site of Grace.

Dragoncrest Shield Talisman.Location: Found on one of the edges of Bestial Sanctum [Interactive Map Link]

Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1.Location: +1 Variation: Can be found in a locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave (Altus Plateau). When you reach the area with the big axes stomping the ground, you need to get on the first one and jump on the ledge on the left wall.

Erdtree's Favor.Location: Can be found at Fringefolk Hero's Grave.

Erdtree's Favor +1.Location: +1 Variant can be found in the boss room after the boss fight near the forsaken depths grace in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

Faithful's Canvas Talisman.Location: Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Located on a corpse guarded by two Prawn Miners.

Fire Scorpion Charm.Location: Found up the ramparts on a wooden platform to the west in Fort Laiedd within Mt. Gelmir.

Flamedrake Talisman.Location: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Groveside Cave in Limgrave. .

Flamedrake Talisman +1.Location: +1 Variation: Found at Leyndell Royal Capital, on the ground against a column . Map Link.

Flamedrake Talisman +2.Location: +2 Variation: Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula in Dragonbarrow Cave in eastern Dagonbarrow.

Flock's Canvas Talisman.Location: Drops from Gowry after completing the Millicent questline and killing him.

Furled Finger's Trick-Mirror.Location: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 5,000 Runes.

Godfrey Icon.Location:
Drops from Godefrey the Grafted
 Golden Lineage Evergaol, east of Grand Lift of Dectus.

Godskin Swaddling Cloth.Location: Spiritcaller's Cave: Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble in a consecutive boss encounter. Map Link.

Gold Scarab.Location: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight (Sickle) & Cleanrot Knight (Spear) boss found in Abandoned Cave in Caelid.

Graven-Mass Talisman.Location: Albinauric Rise within the eastern Consecrated Snowfield, which can be accessed using both Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right) at the Grand Lift of Rold.

Graven-School Talisman.Location:
Found up the ladder close to the Debate Hall Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria and then down the hole to another the room with potboys.
 Before the Red Wolf of Radagon, hit the bookshelf next to the left stair-case which will lead to a secret room. Go up the ladder close to the left, near the entrance of the room. Run down the left side and then jump down the hole of the broken wooden structure to another room with Living Jars. Map Link.

Great-Jar's Arsenal.Location: Reward for completing the 3 duelist NPC invasions in Dragonbarrow (Caelid North) for the giant Living Jar in the area. You will only be able to access this area by coming up from Siofra Deep River Well in the underground. This area can also be accessed by climbing the roots above the large crystal at the bottom of the valley. However, this is most likely unintentional.

Greatshield Talisman.Location: Found in a chest on a Wagon East of Grace "Erdtree-Gazing Hill" behind Ancient Dragon Lansseax. Map Link.

Green Turtle Talisman.Location: Summonwater Village. In an underground area on the outskirts of the village. Map Link.

Haligdrake Talisman.Location: Looted off a body in the Stranded Graveyard. Map Link.

Haligdrake Talisman +1.Location: +1 Variation: Looted off a body near Lyndell Catacombs site of grace, below Leyndell Royal Capital, behind two hidden walls.

Haligdrake Talisman +2.Location: +2 Variation: Looted off a body in Mohgwyn Palace, found in a small cluster of graves near a watchful Giant Crow perched up high.

Hammer Talisman.Location: Dropped by defeating Recusant Henricus North-East of Stormhill Shack. Map Link.

Host's Trick-Mirror.Location: Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 5,000 Runes.

Immunizing Horn Charm.Location: Found on one of the corpses in an ant nest in Ainsel River. Map Link.

Immunizing Horn Charm +1.Location: +1 Variant: Found by killing a wandering shaman in the lake of rot.

Kindred of Rot's Exultation.Location: Dropped by the Kindred of Rot in Seethewater Cave. Map Link.

Lightning Scorpion Charm.Location: Can be found in the Wyndham Catacombs in a room sealed by an Imp Statue, requires a Stonesword Key.

Longtail Cat Talisman.Location: Raya Lucaria Academy: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift. Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down and defeat the single Pendulum Statue enemy.

Lord of Blood's Exultation.Location: Drops from Esgar, Priest of Blood in Leyndell Catacombs.

Marika's Scarseal.Location: Found on a corpse at the base of the waterfall found at the highest level of Siofra River. Map Link.

Marika's Soreseal.Location:
Found on an altar in a room requiring a Stonesword Key in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Map Link.
 From the Elphael Inner Wall Site of Grace (Map Link), leave the area through the eastern door and head down the ladder to the south-east. After going through the arch, turn right and follow the path, circling the city until you get to the imp statue. Be careful of enemies along the way and inside the room as you pick up the talisman.

Moon of Nokstella.Location: Found in a chest underneath a massive throne in Nokstella, Eternal City. Map Link.

Mottled Necklace.Location: Found at the very edge of the ruined bridge leading to Nokron, Eternal City. This area is accessible via Waygate at The Four Belfries. Map Link.

Mottled Necklace +1.Location: +1 Variation: Can be found on a corpse on top of some ruined arches in Nokron, Eternal City. Map Link.

Pearldrake Talisman.Location: Can be found behind the first waygate of The Four Belfries

Pearldrake Talisman +1.Location: +1 Variation: can be found in Wyndham Ruins in the Mt. Gelmir region. The talisman is found inside a chest at the end of the area sealed by an Imp Statue, a Stonesword Key is required.

Pearldrake Talisman +2.Location: +2 Variation: can be found in Miquella's Haligtree above the Mountaintops of the Giants region. The talisman is found on a body above the Haligtree Town Site of Grace.

Perfumer's Talisman.Location: Can be found in Perfumer's Ruins in a chest underground below stairs in the room with the yellow poison flower.

Primal Glintstone Blade.Location: Stargazer Ruins in Mountaintops of the Giants: Found in a chest in an underground area near the center of the ruins. The entrance is sealed by a barrier and there is a talking Jellyfish outside who is looking for her sister. Summon your Spirit Jellyfish that you acquired at the beginning of the game to unlock the seal. Map Link.

Prince of Death's Pustule.Location:
Can be located at Stormveil Castle.
 Nearest Site of Grace can be located at Liftside Chamber.
 Looted off a corpse that can be found at the pit of the castle's crypt. The body can be found next to a giant face that is structured from roots. It is guarded by a Root Monster, players will need to defeat the guardian to reach the spot. Map Link.

Prosthesis-Wearer Heirloom.Location: Finish the sidequest given by Gowry in Caelid, then return to Millicent to receive the talisman.

Radagon Icon.Location: Raya Lucaria Academy: Found inside a treasure chest on the second floor of the Debate Parlor Site of Grace. From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head forward leading to the courtyard. Make a hard right and jump over the fence. Climb up the ladder and head through the broken glass window. The treasure chest is on the east section. Map Link.

Radagon's Scarseal.Location: Drops from the boss of Weeping Evergaol (Ancient Hero of Zamor) in the Weeping Peninsula. See map here.

Radagon's Soreseal.Location: Fort Faroth, Caelid: Found on a corpse by dropping down the opening from the roof and exploring around the wooden walkways.

Red-Feathered Branchsword.Location: Liurnia of the Lakes: Drops from a Deathbird boss that spawns directly north-east of Scenic Isle site of grace near collapsed structure at night. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Ritual Shield Talisman.Location: From the West Capital Rampart site of grace in Leyndell, follow the marble stairway heading South-Southwest, past a Valiant Gargoyle near a Golden Seed and up the stair toward a giant Colloseum, the talisman is at the top of the hill, in front of the door of the Colloseum. Map Link.

Ritual Sword Talisman.Location: Located in Lux Ruins, in a chest down a set of stairs after the boss.

Roar Medallion.Location: Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll, located in the Limgrave Tunnels. He is found at the end of the dungeon. Map Link.

Sacred Scorpion Charm.Location: Dropped by invader Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater when defeated. Map Link.

Shabriri's Woe.Location: Can be found on a body at the edge of the Frenzied Flame Village. Map Link.

Silver Scarab.Location: Found in a chest in Hidden Path to the Haligtree. In the large central room, there is a broken section of railing. There you can drop down to an invisible platform, and walk to a small room. The chest is past an illusory wall, behind the Grave Glovewort (9). Map Link

Spear Talisman.Location: Found in a chest inside Lakeside Crystal Cave near a demi-human campfire. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

Spelldrake Talisman.Location: Acquired by defeating Runebear at the end of the Earthbore Cave in the Weeping Peninsula. Map Link.

Spelldrake Talisman +1.Location: +1 Variant: Can be found in Selia Town of Sorcery on the north west side of the area near two enemies below the Staff of Loss - requires the lighting of a bonfire on the towers.

Spelldrake Talisman +2.Location: +2 Variant: Found in the secret catacombs underneath the Hidden Path to the Haligtree by turning right just before the Stray Mimic Tear's boss door, following the corridor up and taking the lift. The talisman can be found on a corpse in an alcove at the top. See the location's page for details on how to get to the catacombs.

Stalwart Horn Charm.Location: Can be found in eastern Liurnia. Fast travel to Mausoleum Compound and head north up the incline, then turn left and follow the cliff edge southwest. When you reach the large vertical rock formation, walk around it counter-clockwise until you see a hole in the wall. Go through it and you will find the talisman on a corpse to your left overhanging a cliff.

Stalwart Horn Charm +1.Location: +1 Variant : Can be found in the southwestern area of Consecrated Snowfield, on the way to Yelough Anix Tunnel entrance between the two large "trees". It is located on a corpse slumped over a log and is guarded by two Ancestral Followers.

Stargazer Heirloom.Location: Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia. Map Link.

Starscourge Heirloom.Location: Can be found in Fort Gael. Map Link.

Taker's Cameo.Location: Awarded by Tanith at Volcano Manor after completing the third letter quest. This requires you to visit the Mountaintops of the Giants, invade and defeat Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood. Map Link.

Twinblade Talisman.Location: Castle Morne: From the "Back of the Castle" Site of Grace, drop down to the western end of the castle and follow the path along the outer walls. There is a tower section of the walls in the westernmost corner. Climb up the ladder and go around the tower to find a chest where the talisman can be found. Map Link.

Two Fingers Heirloom.Location: Can be found on the lower level of the Purified Ruins. It is on the chest in front of you as you descend. Map Link.

Viridian Amber Medallion.Location: Dropped by Miranda the Blighted Bloom in Tombsward Cave.

Viridian Amber Medallion +1.Location: +1 Variant can be found in Altus Plauteau, south of the Outer Wall Battleground (around -93, 104) Site of Grace. You should hear Margit whisper, "I see you, Tarnished..." to you before appearing on the road. Defeat him again and it will drop.

Viridian Amber Medallion +2.Location: +2 Variant is in Haligtree. The closest site of grace is the Haligtree Town Plaza. Run to the roof with the Summoning Snail, jump to the building on the right (it's lower), immediately turn around and jump inside the building. There will be a chest with the medallion and some mushroom people

Winged Sword Insignia.Location: Stillwater Cave: Dropped by the Cleanrot Knight boss upon defeat. Map Link.

Azula Beastman Ashes.Location: Crumbling Farum Azula: Found at the bottom level of the Dragon Temple. Begin at the Dragon Temple grace site, then jump down to the west onto the stairs. Do not go up the stairs; turn east and jump down again. There is an entrance door to the east with stairs going up which leads to a crypt with several sarcophagi and two enemies. One static, one patrolling. The ashes can be found on the furthest sarcophagus in the back. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Dung Eater Puppet.Location: Sold by Seluvis after using Seluvis's Potion on the Dung Eater and bringing him 5 Starlight shards

Nepheli Loux Puppet.Location: Can be collected in Caria Manor from Pidia if Nepheli Loux drank Seluvis's Potion. After advancing Ranni's questline to the point where you give her the Fingerslayer Blade and she departs from Ranni's Rise, Seluvis will die. Now when you head down to revisit Pidia you will hear him pleading for his life from the puppets. After you arrive you'll find his corpse in the middle of three standing puppets (can't be attacked). His corpse has this puppet and Pidia's Ball Bearing. However if Nepheli didn't drink the potion, Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet will be found instead.

Oracle Envoy Ashes.Location:
Miquella's Haligtree near Haligtree Town site of grace [Elden Ring Map]

Unless you want to watch your back when you run from the Haligtree Town site of grace, I suggest running to the ashes from the start of the area.  When you are running towards the second grace, you will start getting attacked from the big Oracle Envoy. Before the first attack reaches you, you can fall or jump to a lower branch on the right side. Follow that branch going upwards and you will find the ashes to the right being guarded by four Oracle Envoys. Two small ones, one medium, and a large one.

Avionette Soldier Ashes.Location: Located on a corpse after taking the rotating lift down in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of grace, go back outside to the large lift and ride it down. Face north and jump off the lift early onto a rocky platform. There will be an an enemy ambush waiting near the ashes. Map Link

Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes.Location: In Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree, start at the Prayer Room site of grace. Go through the northern door and and continue in that direction until you come upon a staircase leading down a level. Descending from there, there should be a broken railing to your right and a dead end to the north. From the dead end, look over the railing to the east, there should be an archway you can jump onto. Finally jump down onto the platform to your north, you’ll know you’re in the right place when you see a gazebo in front of you and a doorway to the west. The ashes are in a chest through the doorway guarded by a Cleanrot Knight. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Crystalian Ashes.Location: Located in a chest protected by three masked magic users in a room that is located down a pathway up the purple crystals next to the Trio Putrid Crystallin's (bosses) boss door in the Sellia Hideaway, eastern Caelid. The entrance is hidden in the top of the room with the Crystal Darts, accessible by climbing the crystals starting on the right just as you enter the chamber. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Haligtree Soldier Ashes.Location: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found under a large decorative chalice in the northern edge of the city. [Map Link]

Marionette Soldier Ashes.Location: Raya Lucaria Academy: When you reach the graveyard section, as you cross the other side of the bridge, make a hard left and drop down to find a path that curves to where the Marionette Soldiers are, kill the two soldiers and then loot the corpse that is hanging by the ledge to find this item. Map Link

Page Ashes.Location: Can be found in Cliffbottom Catacombs, on the tomb being watched by an Ogre in the final room of the catacomb after climbing up the ladder. Map Link

Albinauric Ashes.Location: Found on a corpse in the graveyard area east of Caria Manor. This area is accessible only after completing the manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

Ancestral Follower Ashes.Location: Dropped by Ancestor Spirit. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link. Video Location

Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor boss inside the Sainted Hero’s Grave west of Leyndell, Royal Capital. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Archer Ashes.Location: Found on a corpse tucked behind a building in Nokstella, Eternal City, to the left after going up the stairs with the exploding Silver Tears. Map Link

Banished Knight Engvall Ashes.Location: Murkwater Catacombs: Obtained after defeating the boss Grave Warden Duelist. Seems to have been included with patch 1.03

Banished Knight Oleg Ashes.Location: In Fringefolk Hero's Grave: To get there, use 2 Stonesword Keys on the double Imp Keystone next to the Stranded Graveyard  Site of Grace. This will lead to a mini dungeon with traps. You will need to avoid a crusher by walking into side alcoves as you descend. There will also be ghost swordsmen and archers. Map Link

Battlemage Hugues Ashes.Location: Dropped by Battlemage Hugues (boss) located in the Sellia Evergaol. The best way to reach the evergaol is to travel south east along the cliff from the Dragonbarrow West site of grace. It will be on top of a plateau overlooking Aeonia Swamp. Elden Ring Map Link

Black Knife Tiche.Location: Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader upon defeat at the Ringleader's Evergaol in southwestern Liurnia. [Map Link]

Blackflame Monk Amon Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Stray Mimic Tear boss located in the Hidden Path to the Haligtree. This boss is in the secret catacombs underneath the large staircase in the main hall, accessible by navigating a series of invisible walkways. See the dungeon page for details on how to reach the boss. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Bloodhound Knight Floh.Location: Gelmir Hero's Grave (in chest after dungeon boss). Map Link

Demi-Human Ashes.Location: Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog found within the Impaler's Catacombs, located in the Weeping Peninsula. Map Link

Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes.Location: Located on a corpse in Volcano Manor that is near the top of Mt. Gelmir, west of Altus Plateau. Finding these ashes involves beginning the Volcano Manor questline. Once inside the manor talk to Lady Tanith and agree to receive the drawing-room key which opens the doors in the hallway to the right. In the room opposite to a bolted shut door is an illusionary wall that hides the secret passage leading you around the manor's perimeter into the locked room that hides the corpse holding the ashes. Map Link

Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet.Location: Can be chosen from Preceptor Seluvis after finding his puppet collection in a hidden basement within the region, and having chosen to give Seluvis's Potion to Nepheli Loux.

Fanged Imp Ashes.Location: It can be purchased from the Isolated Merchant for 2000 Runes. He can be found by traveling to the Main Academy Gate site of grace and following the elevated road east, past the seal and several wolves. [Elden Ring Map Location]

Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet.Location:
Can be bought from Seluvis' body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Map Link

If Seluvis's Potion is given to anyone else other than Nepheli Loux then you can find this Spirit Ashes on the body of  Pidia after progressing Ranni's questline far enough for Seluvis to perish resulting in the puppets Pidia were given by Seluvis to turn against him. His corpse can be looted for this Ash and Pidia's Bell Bearing.

Giant Rat Ashes.Location: Located at West Windmill Pasture, in the middle of the stable with the rats. Map Link.

Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes.Location: Defeat the Spirit-Caller Snail at the Road's End Catacombs. Map Link

Godrick Soldier Ashes.Location: Found at the Cemetery at the west of Stormhill that is filled with Spirit Jellyfish, next to a grave. Check both sides of each grave to find it. (Map Link)

Greatshield Soldier Ashes.Location: Found on a corpse in a graveyard in Nokron, Eternal City guarded by a Fallen Hawks Soldier. Map Link

Jarwight Puppet.Location: Can be bought from Seluvis' body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline. Map Link

Kaiden Sellsword Ashes.Location: Drops from Erdtree Burial Watchdog in Cliffbottom Catacombs. Map Link

Kindred of Rot Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade (boss) in the Caelid Catacombs located in Caelid east from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Map Link

Land Squirt Ashes.Location: Found at a grave with several groups of land squirts nearby on the east shore of Liurnia Lake. To reach it, start at the Gate Town Bridge site of grace, and travel north along the shore. Map Link

Latenna the Albinauric.Location:
Liurnia of the Lakes, Slumbering Wolf's Shack, found at the end of Lakeside Crystal Cave upon defeating the boss.
In order for Latenna to be friendly and become a spirit, one has to have the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), given to the player by Albus at the Village of the Albinaurics. Map Link

Leyndell Soldier Ashes.Location: Found in Sainted Hero's Grave in Altus Plateau. After a floor collapsed, make your way back up and retrieve from a corpse. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Lhutel the Headless.Location: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade at the Tombsward Catacombs. Map Link

Lone Wolf Ashes.Location: Given to players by Renna at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave. Return to the Church after getting the ability to summon your Spectral Steed from Melina. You will find Renna sitting by the ruins of the church.

Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Duo) bosses at the end of the Minor Erdtree Catacombs. [Map Link]

Man-Serpent Ashes.Location: Located by the Volcano Manor site of grace in the Volcano Manor legacy dungeon on Mt. Gelmir. The ashes can be found in a room on a corpse surrounded by red candles and three enemies inside the large open room with two large sets of stairs, spiral pillars, and a large egg guarded by a man-serpent at the top. Map Link.

Mausoleum Soldier Ashes.Location:
Located at the base of a small dead tree at the edge of a cliff in the Deeproot Depths.

From the The Nameless Eternal City site of grace located in the Deeproot Depths, go north until you reach the Mausoleum. From there, go north toward the cliff and follow the edge until you reach the northmost location possible. (Map location)

Mimic Tear Ashes.Location: Found in a chest locked behind an imp statue door in Night's Sacred Ground. Map Link Video Location

Miranda Sprout Ashes.Location: Can be found behind an illusionary wall in the Caelid Catacombs, Caelid. Proceed through the Catacombs as normal from the site of grace, once you've reached the first open room, there will be a staircase for you to descend on your left, proceed down and immediately turn around to find a little open room under the stairs that you just came down. Attack the staircase wall to the right to reveal the ashes on a corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

Nightmaiden & Swordstress Puppets.Location: Found in a chest locked behind an imp statue in Nokstella, Eternal City protected by two Nox Monks. Map Link

Noble Sorcerer Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog, at Stormfoot Catacombs. Map Link.

Nomad Ashes.Location: Nomad Ashes can be found on a corpse hanging off a ledge in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital. To reach it, start at the Underground Roadside site of grace, take a left onto the main path and continue to the end where you will see two large enemies praying at statue. (This is past a shortcut gate that needs to be opened first.) Turn right here to reach an open area, and immediately drop to your left. Follow the winding stairs down, then right to go through some hallways. If you keep moving in the same direction you will eventually reach the corpse past some basilisks. [Map Link]

Omenkiller Rollo.Location: Capital Outskirts at Fell Twins Boss Fight. Map Link

Perfumer Tricia.Location: Reward for defeating Perfumer Tricia (boss) and Misbegotten Warrior (boss) in Unsightly Catacombs, Mt. Gelmir. Map Link.

Putrid Corpse Ashes.Location: Drops from Frenzied Duelist, boss of Gaol Cave. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

Radahn Soldier Ashes.Location: Found in the War-Dead Catacombs at the northern tip of Radahn's arena. Go up the stairs to the back right of the first room and go left. Past the archer at the end of the hall turn right, turning right again at the end of that hall past the greatsword knight. Jump through the window to the right near the end of this hall. Go left up the stairs and the ashes will be in a room in front of you behind a knight. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

Raya Lucaria Soldier Ashes.Location: Found inside a chest at the end of Road's End Catacombs. Have to hit the final wall, to dispell it and be able to move on. Beware of the many Fanged Imps at the final room. Map Link

Redmane Knight Ogha Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Putrid Tree Spirit in the War-Dead Catacombs located in eastern Caelid. To find the entrance of the catacombs, travel to the site of grace that appears after defeating Starcourge Radahn and proceed to head north by north east until you have reached the upper most corner of the area, where the watershore meets the cliffside. You'll be able to see the small door along the cliffside. Map Link.

Rotten Stray Ashes.Location: Found north of Sellia Under-Stair Site of Grace inside a building with a corpse and a rotten dog nearby. Map Link

Skeletal Bandit Ashes.Location: Obtained when defeating the Tibia Mariner Field Boss in Liurnia of the Lakes. Map Link.

Skeletal Militiaman Ashes.Location: Obtained when defeating the Tibia Mariner Field Boss in Summonwater Village. See the Tibia Mariner's location on the Interactive Map here.

Spirit Jellyfish Ashes.Location: Limgrave: In Stormhill Shack there's a Woman with a Red Hood that will lend you x1 Spirit Jellyfish Ashes by talking to her several times. Map Link

Stormhawk Deenh.Location: Chapel of Anticipation: Upon returning to this location later in the game, head to the south wing of the Chapel, onto the roof to find a door that leads to the wooden platforms above the main hall of this building. There is a chest on this platform containing the ashes. [Map Link]

Twinsage Sorcerer Ashes.Location: Can be dropped by the Cemetery Shade in Black Knife Catacombs in the Liurnia of the Lake region. Map Link

Vulgar Militia Ashes.Location: Auriza Hero's Grave: In the large Chariot Hall where two Chariots are running almost side by side with a short delay between them, head all the way down to the large pit behind some pillars. Looking down, you can find several wooden beams you can drop down onto. Navigate your way across the beams, heading north to find a hidden area on the right with a statue. Head into the corridor behind the statue and to the right to access a small room where a corpse holding the ashes can be found. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Wandering Noble Ashes.Location: Located on a corpse that is resting against a stone coffin in the Stormfoot Catacombs in Limgrave. Proceed through the catacombs as normal until reaching a ladder that is going up, once you've reached the top continue forward past some Imps until reaching a dead end room that is being guarded by two Imps, the corpse resting against the stone coffin will hold the ashes. Map Link

Warhawk Ashes.Location: Rewarded upon finding the location Prophecy Painting depicts. The location is north of the Church of Pilgrimage at the northern tip of Weeping Peninsula. (The Area in the South). Map Link

Winged Misbegotten Ashes.Location: Unsightly Catacombs: Found on a corpse in a pit with 4 Misbegotten enemies, near the end of the catacombs. [Map Link]

Clayman Ashes.Location: Start from Ainsel River Main grace. Head south, hugging the wall on your left until you reach the waterfall in the southeast corner of the Uhl Palace Ruins, behind the Madness Miranda Flowers. It's on the waterfall's ledge.

Fire Monk Ashes.Location:
Looted from a chest in the Giants' Mountaintop Catacombs:

Descend the first lift you find and then step on the plate again to send it back up. When fully raised, there is a second platform on the lift that will take you to the lowest levels of the catacombs. Continue through this path past two frost breath traps. The spell is found in a chest behind the second trap. [Elden Ring Map Link]

Soldjars of Fortune Ashes.Location: Dropped by the Grave Warden Duelist (boss) in the Auriza Side Tomb located in the eastern part of the Capital Outskirts. Map Link

Twinned Greaves.Location:
Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter

Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

Leyndell Knight Greaves.Location: Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.

Page Trousers.Location: Leyndell Royal Capital: Dropped by an assassin inside the room located below the balcony stairs. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.

 To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to break the tent.

Black Knife Hood.Location: Can found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical Town in Consecrated Grounds. See map location.

Imp Head (Corpse).Location: Looted from a corpse in an alley off the avenue in Leyndell, Royal Capital

Leyndell Knight Helm.Location:
Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.

Redmane Knight Helm.Location: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Map Link.

White Mask.Location: Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. Bloodsoaked Manchettes.Location: Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the Underground Roadside site of grace.

Blue Silver Bracelets.Location:
Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.
 One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

Brave's Bracer.Location: The Brave's Bracer Armor Gauntlets piece is currently unobtainable.

Bull-Goat Gauntlets.Location: Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Map Link

Cleanrot Gauntlets.Location: Can be found at Inner Aeonia.

Drake Knight Gauntlets.Location:
You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.
 Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver. Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

Elden Lord Bracers.Location: Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah Loux, Warrior.

Errant Sorcerer Manchettes.Location: Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found in a house in the northeast corner of the village.

Fire Monk Gauntlets.Location: Obtained when defeating the Fire Monk Abbot, leader of the camp. Map Link.

Fire Prelate Gauntlets.Location:
Dropped by Fire Prelates.
 One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.
 One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

Godrick Knight Gauntlets.Location: Fort Haight. Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort walls. Map Link.

Gold Bracelets.Location: Gold Bracelets can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his body.

Haligtree Gauntlets.Location: Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Map Link

Highwayman Gauntlets.Location: Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

Millicent's Gloves.Location: The Millicent's Gloves Armor Gauntlets piece is not currently obtainable.

Night's Cavalry Gauntlets.Location: You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield: From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

Nox Monk Bracelets.Location: Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in Nokron and Nokstella.

Omen Gauntlets.Location: The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the Subterranean Shunning Grounds at the Leyndell Capital

Perfumer Gloves.Location: Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

Radahn Soldier Gauntlets.Location: Chace to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers around Fort Gael.

Redmane Knight Gauntlets.Location: Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

Zamor Bracelets.Location: Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the Giants

Alberich's Bracers.Location: Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyendell Royal Capital. Map Link

Astrologer Gloves.Location:
Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.

Azur's Manchettes.Location: After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. Azur's Glintstone Manchettes will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.

Battlemage Manchettes.Location:
This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.
 One can be found in Altus Plateau, East of the West Windmill Pasture. He is on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

Blaidd's Gauntlets.Location: Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring, return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets, and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).

Bloodhound Knight Gauntlets.Location: Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. [Elden Ring Interactive Map Link]

Briar Gauntlets.Location: Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer of the Briar in The Shaded Castle

Carian Knight Gauntlets.Location:
You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy
 To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section, specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

Champion Bracers.Location:
Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.

Fingerprint Gauntlets.Location: Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon defeat.

Gauntlets.Location: Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kalé. It costs 1000 Runes. Map Link.

Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from the Erdtree Guardians that are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.

All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.

Queen's Bracelets can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for 7,000

After obtaining the second to last letter from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm.
